provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Judicature (Resident Short title
Magistrates) (Amendment) Act, 2000 and shall be read and ;"".5;"
construed as one with the Judicature (Resident Magistrates)
Act (hereinafter referred to as the principal Act) and a11
amendments thereto.
                           [No. 2]                The Judicature (Resident Magistrates)
          2                                             (Amendment) Act, 2000
          Amendment           2. Subsection (2) of section 268 of the principal Act is
          of section        amended by deleting from the proviso the words "four
          268 of
          principal         thousand" wherever they appear and substituting therefor,
          Act.
                            in each case, the words "one million".
